name: The Donut Shaped Fish and I
name_original: The Donut Shaped Fish and I
description:
A and D to move, Space to "jump".

Your fish is always going to chase worms, and worms are thrown in the direction of your cursor. You can push your fish from the inside for precision adjustments!

Note: This game isn't terribly easy, so if you are dying repeatedly that's ok!

This is my first game ever (apart for ones that aren't finished), and my first time really using Unity. Just me on this one, and time got tight so no sound :( 

Only one level, made with love.

All assets were created by me in the 48 hours.
